body: Ball Lightning (Electricity), Bestial Form* (Change), Cinder Storm (Fire), Elder Cure (Healing), Far Sight* (Divination), Grave Bane (Death), Monstrous Form (Change), Revive (Life), Servitor V (Summoning), Unmake (Dispelling)
